name: @schmitech/chatbot-api
description: API client for the ORBIT MCP server

scripts.test:npm: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' ./test/test-npm-package.ts
scripts.test-query: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' ./test/run-query.js
scripts.test-query-from-pairs: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' ./test/run-query-from-pairs.js
